package.name: motoman_mh110_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman MH110 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman MH110 series of manipulators.

Visual appearance, joint limits and maximum joint velocities are identical to the successor GP110 model, the only differences being joint effort limits and DX200 vs YRC1000 controller connection. Information on the MH110 can be found in HW1482741 (169859-1CD Rev. 2). The GP110 online documentation files (CAD model GP110_SP100_3D.zip and drawing datasheet HW1385705.01) can be found here.
All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Christian Juelg
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
